video_prompt: Ornate celestial ship, castle-decked, sails billowing, glides dynamically through swirling cloud-sea. Stars twinkle, nebulae slowly rotate, bright golden galaxy-like formation pulsates. Ship subtly shifts position, emphasizing its grand, soaring movement.
image_prompt: A vibrant digital painting of an ornate celestial ship, resembling a fantasy castle-laden sailboat, with glowing windows and white sails, soaring dynamically through a swirling, starry sky of purple and dark blue clouds. Focus on intricate details and a sense of wonder.
refined_video_prompt: Sails billow as the ship glides dynamically, subtly shifting position, emphasizing grand, soaring movement. The surrounding cloud-sea swirls. Stars twinkle, nebulae slowly rotate, and a bright golden galaxy-like formation pulsates rhythmically.
